title: [PATCH]: GSOC HMR Page route change top scrollheight location
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.headline: Top of the page
gist.blurb: Navigating the GSoC app just got smoother. We've fixed the scroll behavior so every new page starts fresh at the top.
gist.summary: Implemented scroll-to-top functionality on route changes in the GSoC app and cleaned up outdated timeline components.
gist.impact: Users will experience smoother navigation with pages correctly loading from the top instead of maintaining previous scroll positions.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot in a cozy pixel art study room, rolling a long parchment scroll all the way to the top. Represents the 'scroll to top' fix.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot rolling a long digital parchment scroll to the top in a sunny study room. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
